createView.remarks: Joins StateProvince table with CountryRegion table.

changeSet.createView: CREATE VIEW [Person].[vStateProvinceCountryRegion] WITH SCHEMABINDING AS SELECT sp.[StateProvinceID] ,sp.[StateProvinceCode] ,sp.[IsOnlyStateProvinceFlag] ,sp.[Name] AS [StateProvinceName] ,sp.[TerritoryID] ,cr.[CountryRegionCode] ,cr.[Name] AS [CountryRegionName] FROM [Person].[StateProvince] sp INNER JOIN [Person].[CountryRegion] cr ON sp.[CountryRegionCode] = cr.[CountryRegionCode];
